name: Paleora Alpha
description:
Paleora is an in-development 2d dinosaur ranching game with survival aspects. Explore to find new crop types to farm, new dinosaur species, and unlock the secrets of the island!

Discord Invite

Roadmap

Paleora Alpha is a very barebones, early alpha version of the game released for followers to help playtest. Feel free to download the game and report any bugs or suggestions you may have. 

Thanks! 

- Witch
